about-text.first: I am a technology enthusiast, constantly motivated by the potential to solve problems and generate value through software development. Throughout my career, I have had the privilege of working with amazing companies and professionals, which has significantly contributed to my growth.
about-text.second: When I develop an application, I always prioritize the user experience, starting with understanding their needs and requirements, and then seeking a technical solution that meets their expectations. I believe that the success of a project is based on clear communication of objectives and constant feedback throughout the development process.
